text:
@realDonaldTrump #coronavirus

.
Is that why you lied about giving the military a 10% raise? Or letting go of the National Guard troops one day before they were to receive benefits? You're a bastard and a traitor to your own country. It's why the FBI calls Trump Tower "The Russian Laundromat."
